header.title: Topic Preview
header.description: Topic Preview displays a short excerpt of text from the first post in a tooltip while the mouse hovers over a topicâ€™s title. Settings in the ACP allow you to adjust the amount of text shown, to use native browser tooltips or a pretty jQuery theme with options to also show user's avatars, and both the first and last posts from the topic. Topic Preview is customizable to get the right look for each style in your board. (Note: This MOD was inspired by a similar MOD by RMcGirr83.)
header.author-notes: Styling / Behavior options: You can change the appearance and behavior of the "jQuery Topic Preview" theme for each style installed on your board. Search in your styles overall_footer.html file for .topicPreview and you will find available settings for: Themes, Width, Hover Delay Time and Position adjustment.

changelog.change: Total overhaul of code base
Replaced qTip2 and TipTip add-ons with a new integrated jQuery Topic Preview theme
Added an ACP option to use native browser tooltips or the new jQuery Topic Preview theme
Added an ACP option to display user's avatars in the jQuery Topic Preview theme
Added an ACP option to display both first and last posts in the new jQuery Topic Preview theme
Moved all ACP settings to the .MODs tab
Added Czech language pack
Added French language pack
Updated MODX to 1.2.6.
Updated UMIL to 1.0.5.
Optional Add-On : qTip2 jQuery plug-in for Topic Preview
Optional Add-On : TipTip jQuery plug-in for Topic Preview
Optional Add-On : Topic Preview for NV Recent
Optional Add-On : Topic Preview for Board3 Portal v2.0.X instructions
Optional Add-On : Topic Preview for Precise Similar Topics II instructions
Added Polish language pack
Upgraded UMIL package to 1.0.4
Added German and Italian language packs
Added non-English language pack install instructions
Optional add-on: Preserve Line-Breaks in Topic Previews
Minor speed improvement (suggested by MOD team)
Optional add-on: Topic Preview integration for Board3 Portal instructions
Note: This version was not released to the public
Now all "Magic URLs" are properly stripped from Topic Preview
Optional add-on: Topic Preview BBcode tag will allow users to use a [topicpreview] BBcode so anything inside the [topicpreview][/topicpreview] tags will be used as the Topic Preview
Spanish language translation added (thank you Ahri89)
Romanian language translation added (thank you StoarceCreierul)
Upgraded UMIL package to 1.0.2
Minor fixes
Added an option to UCP for users to disable Topic Preview

Added an ACP option to define BBcodes whose content you want removed from Topic Preview. This is good for spoiler or hidden text BBcodes, Youtube BBcodes, or if you find any other BBcodes causing undesirable effects in the Topic Preview
Optimized Topic Preview functions allowing for less modified code in the core phpBB files
Cleaned up the style edits too!
We now use UMIL and an install file to perform the SQL changes during installation
Updated install instructions to ModX 1.2.5
subsilver2 edits placed in a seperate MODX file
Fixed URL removal to include https, ftp, mailto and phpBB shortened URLs
Changed Mod name to Topic Preview
Now we also remove URLs from the tooltip preview (why waste space with raw URLs?)
Smileys are now displayed in the tooltip as text :)
Fixed language file variable names
Cleaned up old/unnecessary code in install file
First beta version

				"style" : "light", // use "light" or "dark" topic preview theme
				"delay" : 1500, // sets the delay before showing topic previews (in milliseconds)
				"width" : 360, // sets the width of topic previews (in pixels)
				"left"  : 75, // sets the position offset from the left (in pixels)
				"drift" : 15, // sets the amount of vertical animation, use negative values to change direction (in pixels)
